name: @sparesparrow/mcp-prompts
description: MCP server for managing prompts and templates with project orchestration capabilities

scripts.build: npx tsc && npm run copy-static-files && chmod +x build/index.js && node ./fix-build.js
scripts.copy-static-files: cp package.json build/ && cp README.md build/ && mkdir -p build/data/prompts build/data/backups
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts,js --exec "npm run build && npm start"
scripts.prepare: node -e "process.env.CI || process.env.DOCKER_BUILD ? console.log('Skipping prepare in CI/Docker') : process.exit(1)" || npm run build
scripts.docker:down: docker stop mcp-prompts && docker rm mcp-prompts

author: sparesparrow
